text:
Roger Michael Steele (born 29 May 1939) is an Australian politician. He is a member of the Country Liberal Party. He served as a member of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly from 1974 to 1987. He represented Ludmilla (1974–1983) and Elsey (1983–1987).
Steele also served as the Speaker of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly from 1984 to 1986.

annotations.surface_form: Speaker of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly
